Reference

Exported Functions

balance.miss.l()

Search for the optimal balanced item-level planned missing designs.

balance.miss()

Search for the optimal balanced item-level planned missing designs.

forward.opt()

Search for the optimal item-level PM design via forward assembly.

forward.opt.simsem()

Search for the optimal PM design using forward assembly.

opt.nm.1()

Search for the optimal missing pattern with only one missing measured variable. An internal function for forward assembly.

opt1.simsem()

Search for the optimal missing pattern with only one missing measured variable. An internal function for forward assembly.

plotPM()

Plot the missing data patterns for the optimal PM design.

pres.cost()

Examine the cost of lower level designs in forward assembly (deprecated).

pres.design()

Check the simulation results for lower level designs in forward assembly. pres.design is only applicable when Mplus is used for simulations.

simPM()

Search for an optimal PM design.

summary.simpm()

Extract the summary information of the simpm object.

wave.miss.l()

Search for the optimal wave-level PM designs.

wave.miss()

Search for the optimal wave-level PM designs.

Internals

Search for the optimal balanced item-level planned missing designs.

Search for the optimal item-level PM design via forward assembly.

Search for the optimal missing pattern with only one missing measured variable. An internal function for forward assembly.

Search for the optimal missing pattern with only one missing measured variable. An internal function for forward assembly.

plotPM()

Plot the missing data patterns for the optimal PM design.

pres.cost()

Examine the cost of lower level designs in forward assembly (deprecated).

pres.design()

Check the simulation results for lower level designs in forward assembly. pres.design is only applicable when Mplus is used for simulations.

simPM()
